constituent: muscle, bamboo, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, power, muscle, arnold
heisigStory: Bamboo . . . part of the body . . . power. Here we see how the primitive meaning of muscle was derived from the kanji for power.
koohiiStory1: Muscle is part of the body that gives strength, and can be both supple and tense like the bamboo.
koohiiStory2: Lifting BAMBOO STICKS is an old way for your BODY to put on lots of MUSCLE.
myStory: chữ cân. gân, thớ thịt, cơ. cơ bắp. bộ phận sức mạnh tre là cơ bắp.
words: muscle, string, line, stripe, plot, plan, sinew
